title: Dubai
itinerary: Arrival in Dubai, check-in at the hotel, and enjoy a welcome dinner.
Explore the Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, and the Dubai Fountain.
Desert safari with dune bashing, camel rides, and a traditional BBQ dinner.
Visit Palm Jumeirah, Atlantis The Palm, and enjoy water sports.
Free day for shopping and leisure, followed by a farewell dinner.

title: Paris
itinerary: Arrival in Paris, check-in at the hotel, and enjoy a welcome dinner.
Visit the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and Seine River Cruise.
Explore Montmartre, Sacré-Cœur Basilica, and enjoy a French cuisine cooking class.
Day trip to Versailles Palace and Gardens.
Free day for shopping and leisure, followed by a farewell dinner.
